word: THE PERSONAL MESSAGES WRITTEN BY MRS. WHITE UNDER VARYING CIRCUMSTANCES, AND PRESENTED HERE FOR THE COMFORT OF THOSE WHO MUST SUFFER, WILL HELP TO ANSWER THE QUESTIONS, WHY, IF GOD IS A GOD OF LOVE, MUST HIS PEOPLE SUFFER LONG ILLNESS? WHY MUST THEY LANGUISH ON BEDS OF PAIN? COMFORT AND ENCOURAGEMENT WILL COME TO THE PERSON WHO IS PASSING THROUGH EXPERIENCES OF A CHARACTER DESCRIBED IN THESE PAGES. WHATEVER REPETITION OCCURS IS MERELY FOR THE PURPOSE OF BRINGING COMFORT IN AS MANY PERSONAL SITUATIONS AS POSSIBLE.--WHITE TRUSTEES.
